description.full: Family Feud® game pits families and friends against each other in a contest to vie for cash by trying to identify the top answers to questions asked in a 100 person survey. The first family that amasses 300 points through multiple game rounds wins.  The winning family then moves to the Fast Money round, where 2 family members are asked 5 questions in a row. If their combined total points for the 5 questions is 200 and up, they win $20,000! Family Feud 2012 Edition will feature 2000+ survey questions, 16 Theme weeks where players can play alone or cooperatively, unlockable hilarious outtakes and “best of” video moments from the television show featuring host Steve Harvey and more!

The first family that amasses 300 points through multiple game rounds wins.  Family Feud 2012 Edition will feature 2000+ survey questions, 16 Theme weeks, unlockable hilarious outtakes and “best of” video moments featuring host Steve Harvey and more!
